document_data.name: Courynna Jacerryl
document_data.mainbody:
'''Courynna Jacerryl''' was a high priestess of [[Sel没ne]]. Within the [[church of Sel没ne|clergy of Sel没ne]], she held the rank of High Initiate and oversaw seventeen young [[cleric]]s, including [[Maera (cleric)|Maera]].

She and her followers once performed a "night stalk" ceremony in honor of the goddess, who was pleased and produced ''[[Moonfire (substance)|moonfire]]''. Courynna called this a blessing and directed her followers to gather the sacred substance.
